metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9952 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An input validation issue was addressed with improved input validation.This issue is fixed in iOS 14.0 and iPadOS 14.0, tvOS 14.0, watchOS 7.0,Safari 14.0, iCloud for Windows 11.4, iCloud for Windows 7.21. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9952` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
